attributes.action: turn Post Offices into "Mail Collection Centres"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of closing Post Offices we should stop postal deliveries, and turn  the post offices into "Mail Collection      Centres" as this will encourage community interaction and increase  trade to improve viability.  Special      arrangements could be made for housebound people; and existing     postmen and women could be re-deployed as sorters, customer servers, and sales persons.  Also people in potential distress could be spotted through an unusual accumulation of uncollected mail.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
